name: is-string
description: Is this value a JS String object or primitive? This module works cross-realm/iframe, and despite ES6 @@toStringTag.

scripts.test: npm run tests-only && npm run test:corejs
scripts.postversion: auto-changelog && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit --no-edit --amend && git tag -f "v$(node -e "console.log(require('./package.json').version)")"
